prompts: Show me a water-type Pokemon that has large claws and a shell-like body.
Imagine a Pokemon with a vibrant red and gray color scheme, perfect for battles.
Create an aquatic creature with a fierce demeanor and powerful pincers.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in the ocean, featuring unique shell patterns.
Design a giant crab-like Pokemon with striking colors and a formidable presence.
Give me a Pokemon that looks intimidating but is playful in nature.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of both land and sea environments.
